
4D 75 6A 61 68 69 64 20 4C 61 74 69 6D 61 68 61 73 68 69 6E
M  u  j  a  h  i  d     L  a  t  i  m  a  h  a  s  h  i  n

4D 75 6A 61 68 69 64 = Mujahid
Jumlah Hexa = 17+75+16+61+68+69+64 = 370
Biner
4D = 0100 1101
75 = 0111 0101
6A = 0110 1010
61 = 0110 0001
68 = 0110 1000
69 = 0110 1001
64 = 0110 0100
